title: How to Make Strawberry Jungle Juice

steps.headline: Cut the apples into small pieces.
Cut the lemons into small pieces.
steps.description: Be sure to wash the peel first.

steps.headline: Cut the strawberries into small pieces.
Place the chopped fruit into the keg.
Pour in the bottle of vodka.
Add in the bottle of sour apple pucker.
Add the bottles of the fizzy strawberry drink.
Mix the drink carefully.
steps.description: Place the keg where it can be accessed easily during the party. Provide cups for people to serve themselves and a bucket of ice to help cool the drinks.

steps.headline: Serve over ice.
steps.description: If serving it, add the ice for the guests; if they're helping themselves, leave a sign asking them to add ice cubes. Enjoy!

text: Preparing To Make The Drink Cut the apples into small pieces.  Cut the lemons into small pieces. Be sure to wash the peel first. Cut the strawberries into small pieces.  Place the chopped fruit into the keg.  Making The Drink Pour in the bottle of vodka.  Add the bottle of rum.  Add in the bottle of sour apple pucker.  Add the bottles of the fizzy strawberry drink.  Mix the drink carefully. Place the keg where it can be accessed easily during the party. Provide cups for people to serve themselves and a bucket of ice to help cool the drinks. Serve over ice. If serving it, add the ice for the guests; if they're helping themselves, leave a sign asking them to add ice cubes. Enjoy!
